exclusion.criterion: History of overt CVD (including myocardial infarction, angina, stroke, and transient ischemic attack)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently on antiplatelet agents (including aspirin, Clopidogrel etc), or HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors (statins);
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD but no other cardiovascular risk factors. He is physically active and has normal fasting glucose and triglyceride levels.
